bio:
Kibell is a Nord carriage driver located just outside Markarth Stables. He waits there until someone needs a ride to any of the capitals.
Kibell will drive the player to any hold capital, a useful service. He charges anywhere from 20 to 50 gold, depending on the distance to the destination.
Upon boarding his carriage, Kibell may share a little tidbit of information about the player's destination, or comment on the weather.
name: Kibell
